alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:33PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Boundary and east central Bonner Counties through 515 PM PDT... At 433 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kootenai, or 8 miles northeast of Sandpoint, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonners Ferry, Naples, Elmira, and Colburn. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 480 and 509. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
